<a id="class_RDTextureFormat"></a>

# RDTextureFormat

**Inherits:** [RefCounted](class_refcounted.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

Texture format (used by [RenderingDevice](class_renderingdevice.md)).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

This object is used by [RenderingDevice](class_renderingdevice.md).

## Property Descriptions

<a id="class_RDTextureFormat_property_array_layers"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](class_int.md) **array_layers** = `1` [ðŸ”—](#class_RDTextureFormat_property_array_layers)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_array_layers**\ (\ value\: [int](class_int.md)\ )
- [int](class_int.md) **get_array_layers**\ (\ )

The number of layers in the texture. Only relevant for 2D texture arrays.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_RDTextureFormat_property_depth"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](class_int.md) **depth** = `1` [ðŸ”—](#class_RDTextureFormat_property_depth)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_depth**\ (\ value\: [int](class_int.md)\ )
- [int](class_int.md) **get_depth**\ (\ )

The texture's depth (in pixels). This is always ``1`` for 2D textures.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_RDTextureFormat_property_format"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[DataFormat](class_renderingdevice.md#enum_RenderingDevice_DataFormat) **format** = `8` [ðŸ”—](#class_RDTextureFormat_property_format)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_format**\ (\ value\: [DataFormat](class_renderingdevice.md#enum_RenderingDevice_DataFormat)\ )
- [DataFormat](class_renderingdevice.md#enum_RenderingDevice_DataFormat) **get_format**\ (\ )

The texture's pixel data format.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_RDTextureFormat_property_height"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](class_int.md) **height** = `1` [ðŸ”—](#class_RDTextureFormat_property_height)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_height**\ (\ value\: [int](class_int.md)\ )
- [int](class_int.md) **get_height**\ (\ )

The texture's height (in pixels).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_RDTextureFormat_property_is_discardable"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **is_discardable** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#class_RDTextureFormat_property_is_discardable)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_is_discardable**\ (\ value\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ )
- [bool](class_bool.md) **get_is_discardable**\ (\ )

If a texture is discardable, its contents do not need to be preserved between frames. This flag is only relevant when the texture is used as target in a draw list.

This information is used by [RenderingDevice](class_renderingdevice.md) to figure out if a texture's contents can be discarded, eliminating unnecessary writes to memory and boosting performance.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_RDTextureFormat_property_is_resolve_buffer"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **is_resolve_buffer** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#class_RDTextureFormat_property_is_resolve_buffer)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_is_resolve_buffer**\ (\ value\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ )
- [bool](class_bool.md) **get_is_resolve_buffer**\ (\ )

The texture will be used as the destination of a resolve operation.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_RDTextureFormat_property_mipmaps"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](class_int.md) **mipmaps** = `1` [ðŸ”—](#class_RDTextureFormat_property_mipmaps)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_mipmaps**\ (\ value\: [int](class_int.md)\ )
- [int](class_int.md) **get_mipmaps**\ (\ )

The number of mipmaps available in the texture.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

- [TextureSamples](class_renderingdevice.md#enum_RenderingDevice_TextureSamples) **get_samples**\ (\ )

The number of samples used when sampling the texture.

- [TextureType](class_renderingdevice.md#enum_RenderingDevice_TextureType) **get_texture_type**\ (\ )

<a id="class_RDTextureFormat_property_usage_bits"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

**BitField**\[[TextureUsageBits](class_renderingdevice.md#enum_RenderingDevice_TextureUsageBits)\] **usage_bits** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#class_RDTextureFormat_property_usage_bits)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_usage_bits**\ (\ value\: **BitField**\[[TextureUsageBits](class_renderingdevice.md#enum_RenderingDevice_TextureUsageBits)\]\ )
- **BitField**\[[TextureUsageBits](class_renderingdevice.md#enum_RenderingDevice_TextureUsageBits)\] **get_usage_bits**\ (\ )

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="class_RDTextureFormat_method_add_shareable_format"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **add_shareable_format**\ (\ format\: [DataFormat](class_renderingdevice.md#enum_RenderingDevice_DataFormat)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_RDTextureFormat_method_add_shareable_format)

Adds `format` as a valid format for the corresponding [RDTextureView](class_rdtextureview.md)'s [RDTextureView.format_override](class_rdtextureview.md#class_RDTextureView_property_format_override) property. If any format is added as shareable, then the main [format](class_rdtextureformat.md#class_RDTextureFormat_property_format) must also be added.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_RDTextureFormat_method_remove_shareable_format"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **remove_shareable_format**\ (\ format\: [DataFormat](class_renderingdevice.md#enum_RenderingDevice_DataFormat)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_RDTextureFormat_method_remove_shareable_format)

Removes `format` from the list of valid formats that the corresponding [RDTextureView](class_rdtextureview.md)'s [RDTextureView.format_override](class_rdtextureview.md#class_RDTextureView_property_format_override) property can be set to.
